title: Bug Splat Issue

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: I have used hextech repair tool, and also received my logs, if they need to be posted :)

replies.body:
Bugsplats are generally the result of hardware issues or corrupt installation of League. Since it's important for League to be able to freely access your hardware and for files to not be corrupt, sudden issues can cause an immediate bugsplat. We've consolidated the most common solutions for this issue in our Bugsplat & Crash guide which you can [find here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes).

Let me know if you still see bugsplats after working through those steps.
